Some saints shared this song with me and mentioned that there are other stanzas.
3. We treasure the Word of God While we are young As a child, we may read it And read it again Yes, the Scriptures are able To make us wise Wise unto salvation In Jesus the Lord.
4. We come to the light When we come to God's Word How the light brightly shines When we really love God! As we love Him and seek Him, God opens His Word, So that God's light shines brightly In His holy Word
5 We like to spend time In the Word of our God, To be faithful to read it With diligent care. Yes, we read and we pray, And we pray what we read - In the days of our youth, We would open God's Word.
6 Remember your Creator While You are young From a child, know the Scriptures And seek out God's truth. Oh, remember your Creator All your life long. And let HIm have a way All your days on the earth.

I got this from the church... (2nd paragraph) Remember your Creator while you are young. To remember our Creator means To love Him. The Lord is the Creator, our source of life. In the days of our youth we would Love only Him.
This precious song can also be sung to the tune of "The church is the house of the living God".
I love this hymn because it can lead me to the right One, which is Christ Himself. Amen.
It tells the children to remember our Creator when we are still young.
